comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Manya Jokel (or Yokel) Gersen (or Gerson) was a dentist in Elizabethtown NY from 1920-1961.  She was married to Dr. Alexander Gersen, mother of Ruth, Edith, and Daniel Gersen.  The dental chair used by Dr. Gersen is on display at the County Attic, Adirondack History Center.
